options.name: timestamp
options.label: Specify the starting timestamp in YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss±hh:mm where the ending hours and minutes are the timezone offset from UTC

options.name: offset-count
options.label: The amount of offset to be added (can be negative)
options.info: The multiplier for the offset size to be added to the timestamp

options.name: offset-size
options.label: The size of the offset to be added
options.info: The size of the offset that will be multiplied by the offset-count and added to the timestamp

options.name: timezone
options.label: Specify the timezone offset from UTC in ±hh:mm
